I'm back! I did pretty well, got second place in sparring! Got the 
wind ki=
cked out of me twice in the last match, but I didn't get to 
sparr my instr=
uctor. Oh well, next time.....

My studio got the team trophy a second time=
 in a row! No other team's 
ever done that!

Thanx to everyone who wished m=
y good luck, it helped. Next year, I'm 
gonna get 1st!

::Rust/=C6gar/Bellu=
m::

Rust nods, looking Whistler over critically. He looks up at the ruins =

of the Ark, which were being taken apart and sorted into usable 
material =
by =C6gar and Bellum.

"Doesn't look like we're gonna get you to a CR over =
there, soldier," 
he says, looking around, "Do you have a beast mode? It co=
uld help to 
transform into it."
